ygData.subject: ********ATTENTION***********  DELETE ANY EMAIL WITH "CHECK THIS" AS THE SUBJECT  *******************
ygData.msgSnippet: Sorry for the mass email. Everyone is BCCed, so please do not reply to all. Thank you. I recieved and email virus with the subject of  Check This. I opened
ygData.messageBody:
Sorry for the mass email. Everyone is BCCed, so please do not reply to all.
Thank you.

I recieved and email virus with the subject of "Check This."

I opened it without thinking first, so if you do get this email, DELETE it
IMMEDIATELY.

My virus scanner did not pick it up, and I do not know if anything was
actually sent out, but I am covering my bases.

It is a mass-email virus and will send to everyone in your addressbook with
you as the sender.


Sorry for the hassle.

Rich.
